apk-signer
============

Easy signing with apk-signer

Installation
------------

|PyPI-Downloads|

.. code:: sh

    pip install apk-signer
    
Prerequirement
----------------
| Download: `Android SDK <https://developer.android.com/studio/releases/platform-tools?hl=ko>`_

Usage
------------

.. code:: sh

    $ apk-signer {APK_PATH}
